summary: OMG. I’m rewatching the Star Wars: Clone Wars movie and the moment where Anakin goes ‘You’re reckless, little one, you might not...
body:
OMG. I’m rewatching the Star Wars: Clone Wars movie and the moment where Anakin goes ‘You’re reckless, little one, you might not make it as Obi-Wan’s Padawan, but you might make it as mine’? 

The music there was re-used again at the ending of Twilight of the Apprentice. Don’t believe me? Here:

And then when Ahsoka injures Vader and his mask is broken and then Vaderkin says: ‘Ahsoka’. 

It’s played lower and slower and more mournful.  

And now this is me:

summary: Spontaneous fanfiction rec list For the Late Fanfiction Writers Appreciation day. I know it's about three days late but I was...
body:
Spontaneous fanfiction rec list

For the Late Fanfiction Writers Appreciation day. I know it’s about three days late but I was real busy that day and compiling this took time.

I have already made Star Wars fanfic rec list on:

  • Fics where Anakin doesn’t Fall
  • Fics that feature GodMode!Ani
  • Fics dealing with Deception Arc*

(* shameless self ad alert)

This time I’m going for fics exploring Anakin and Ahsoka’s relationship. Because I love their relationship. A lot.

Title and author in bold, summary in italics, additional thoughts in parenthesis. List in no particular order.

——

In the Spotlight by HorseStar1 : Because media is a factor in the Star Wars universe, too…Ahsoka Tano was raised in the Temple, where media was hidden from the ears of the Younglings. As a Padawan, however, she’s learning that media and journalists don’t always tell the nicer side of the story - especially in such a divided galaxy - and that sometimes, words can hurt as much as lightsaber wounds. Fluff.

(This author actually has several other oneshot fics exploring Snips-Skyguy relationship)

See No Evil by GirlswithCurls98 : When Ahsoka suffers a head injury, she loses something she thought would always be there. With the help of her friends, she learns how to adapt to her new reality, and how she can use it to her advantage, all while searching for a cure.

(Same as above, just check out their entire work.)

The Making of a Master by Sokaless : In the beginning, he’d had his doubts about Anakin’s ability to train an apprentice. But as Obi-Wan watches Anakin and Ahsoka throughout the Clone Wars, he finds the two have a lot to teach him about attachment, respect, and how to be a friend.

A Padawan to Call My Own by x Bout as Stable as the Wind x : When Ahsoka Tano is assigned as Anakin Skywalker’s new Padawan, he is more than just reluctant to take her – he doesn’t want an apprentice, period. And not because a ‘Padawan would slow him down’. The real reason is because of the little, Force-sensitive, blue-eyed girl he met two months before.

(this one is fairly poignant with some look into Anakin’s mind)

Secrets and Trust by alijoe : When Anakin has a dream about Ahsoka, he becomes alarmed and sticks close by her. But is that enough? When Ahsoka starts acting strangely, and Anakin gets worried and wonders if it’s connected to his dream. But Ahsoka insists nothing is wrong…

(Adventure/action with hurt/comfort elements.)

Neverland by Lady Aeryn : On Tatooine, Ahsoka learns some lessons about her new Master.

(One of those missing scenes in TCW that really needed to be. I just really love the idea of Ahsoka seeing a slightly different side of Anakin as she watches him utilize his experience with Tatooine to be savvy with the locals there.)

Accepting by alexii : Ahsoka’s thoughts after the Battle of Christophsis when she fears rejection by the Chosen One, Anakin Skywalker.

(Another ‘missing scene’ from TCW. What can I say? I love that kind of fics.)

Cataclysm by dendral : For reasons unknown to all but himself, Obi-Wan Kenobi has left the Jedi Order in the midst of the Clone Wars, taking with him a single clone. Anakin Skywalker has been unofficially tasked by the Order to find Obi-Wan and bring him home. Unfortunately for Anakin, it seems his former master is always ten steps ahead of him.

(This isn’t exactly centered on Anakin and Ahsoka’s relationship, but I added because there are some moments. And I enjoyed the fic as well.)

There is one more (a Sith took over earlier AU that I found interesting), but I couldn’t track it down in my convoluted ffnet history. Will update if I find it.

So anyway, to all the fanfic authors, fancomic and art artists, You are all awesome!

summary: The Last Jedi Ruined Everything, was good though
title: The Last Jedi Ruined Everything, was good though
body:
The Last Jedi Ruined Everything, was good though

I recently got the chance to watch the last jedi for free so I took up that chance and watched it on a huge projector type screen, with many other people, in a field in the middle of nowhere.

I went in sort of knowing I would enjoy it, because I had watched a lot of reviews and the parts that were praised I really liked and everything bad I was just like “ok I guess”.

And that’s how watching the…

View On WordPress

summary: The Dark Side is mentioned in two contexts in The Last Jedi.  First it's mentioned in conjunction with the Cave of Introspection...
body: The Dark Side is mentioned in two contexts in The Last Jedi.  First it’s mentioned in conjunction with the Cave of Introspection sought out by Rey.  Then it is also mentioned (by both Snoke and Luke, IIRC) in description of Kylo Ren’s choices and powers.  This is consistent with how the Dark Side has been constructed: as both a source of knowledge, identity, and self-awareness, chosen by individuals, and also as a descriptor that Masters use on students who misbehave or grow in directions that they (the Masters) don’t approove.

reblog.comment: The Dark Side is mentioned in two contexts in The Last Jedi.  First it’s mentioned in conjunction with the Cave of Introspection sought out by Rey.  Then it is also mentioned (by both Snoke and Luke, IIRC) in description of Kylo Ren’s choices and powers.  This is consistent with how the Dark Side has been constructed: as both a source of knowledge, identity, and self-awareness, chosen by individuals, and also as a descriptor that Masters use on students who misbehave or grow in directions that they (the Masters) don’t approove.

trail.content_raw: The Dark Side is mentioned in two contexts in The Last Jedi.  First it’s mentioned in conjunction with the Cave of Introspection sought out by Rey.  Then it is also mentioned (by both Snoke and Luke, IIRC) in description of Kylo Ren’s choices and powers.  This is consistent with how the Dark Side has been constructed: as both a source of knowledge, identity, and self-awareness, chosen by individuals, and also as a descriptor that Masters use on students who misbehave or grow in directions that they (the Masters) don’t approove.
trail.content: The Dark Side is mentioned in two contexts in The Last Jedi.  First it’s mentioned in conjunction with the Cave of Introspection sought out by Rey.  Then it is also mentioned (by both Snoke and Luke, IIRC) in description of Kylo Ren’s choices and powers.  This is consistent with how the Dark Side has been constructed: as both a source of knowledge, identity, and self-awareness, chosen by individuals, and also as a descriptor that Masters use on students who misbehave or grow in directions that they (the Masters) don’t approove.

tags: like this post and ill follow
body:
Need more reylos/multishippers to follow

My dash runs kinda slowly here, help!

-Must be Finn friendly

-Rose Tico/Loan/KMT hate free zone

- FinnRose/FinnPoe friendly (even FinnRey but its ok if not)

-And reylo, lots of reylo!!!!!

-Leia

blog.name: kyluxisperfect
blog.title: ADAM DRIVER IS THE REASON I'M STILL ALIVE
blog.description:
KYLUX because why not. 
Put "Get that piece of junk OUT OF THE SKY!!" on my grave stone. 
Trynna draw things but fail successfully. 
Ships everything in Star Wars and DBH (and sometimes GoT)

summary:
Oh. My. GOSH. 

It feels so good to draw sth I actually LIKE! 

My first kylux...thingy...or sth... 

(I swear, Adam looks A LOT...
caption:
Oh. My. GOSH.

It feels so good to draw sth I actually LIKE!

My first kylux…thingy…or sth…

(I swear, Adam looks A LOT better in real life, the camera sucks)

(Idk why, but I like Hux the most. I think I drew him better than Adam)

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

summary: Build & Relive Scenes From Empire With New Lego Cloud City Set
title: Build & Relive Scenes From Empire With New Lego Cloud City Set
body:
Build & Relive Scenes From Empire With New Lego Cloud City Set

Lego has released some mega construction sets for their Star Wars line in the past including the Death Star, the Ewok Village, and Assault on Hoth. The toy company has announced their most recent big set addition, Betrayal at Cloud City. Much like the previously named ones, Cloud City comes with a hefty price tag. It will cost $349.99 but has so much to offer.

First off, the set is divided into…

View On WordPress

summary: Tony Faye and the Demigod Princess
title: Tony Faye and the Demigod Princess
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Muo3Zd

by Tony166

A young and friendly human being leaves Earth and arrives on a distant planet, teaming up with a demigoddess in the process to stop an evildoers from terrorizing the galaxy in this action-packed and spellbinding science fantasy adventure tale.

Words: 7371, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Tony Faye

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, DCU, DCU (Comics), Man of Steel (2013), 300: Rise of an Empire, 300 (Movies), Multi-Fandom
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Muo3Zd
